info.title: Setu Insights API
info.description: Setu's Insights API gives you actionable insights from a customer's bank statement about their income, expenditure, and financial history.

get.description: Get a list of configured templates for the FIU

schema.title: Template ID for which insights are needed

post.description: Create a template with a list Keyword Maps, Categorisation Mode and Configurable/Static Insights

post.summary: Create FIData block with mixed types support (FIU Webhook)
post.description: Call this API with the data received from FIP's notification as payload, to create an FI DataBlock. Supports multiple account types in single request.

schema.title: FI Data as defined by ReBIT schema

get.description: Call this API with the report-id to get the created Insights

schema.title: Report ID for which insights are needed

value.title: Mostly Cash Mode
value.description: Maximum transactions (80%) involving cash deposit or withdrawals

post.description: Call this API with the template-id received from Setu along with a ref_id, to trigger an Report generation job. The created Report will be shared via a notification to the endpoint configured by the FIU.This API will respond with a report-id, which can also be used to fetch the generated Report.

value.errorMsg: Unable to find FIData with id: 4e8e6d50-2dd4-43d0-a79a-5348b935ecf4

get.summary: Get supported banks for PDF processing
get.description: Retrieve a list of banks supported for PDF statement processing

post.summary: Upload PDF bank statement for processing
post.description: Call this API to upload a PDF bank statement for processing and data extraction

parameters.name: refId
parameters.description: Reference ID for tracking the PDF upload

bankName.description: Name of the bank that issued the statement

password.description: Password for the PDF if it's encrypted

201.description: PDF uploaded and processing started successfully

delete.description: Call this API to delete all data associated with a specific reference ID (refId). This operation cannot be undone.

parameters.name: refId
parameters.description: The reference ID for which data should be purged

value.errorMsg: Unable to authenticate with provided credentials
No data found for the provided refId

keywordMaps.title: List of ids of keyword category maps to be included in the template

categorisationMode.title: Categorisation Mode to use client provided maps strictly or inclusively

insights.title: List of insights to be included in the template

templateId.title: Template ID for which insights are needed

insight.title: Insight
insight.description: Insight name, must start with 'static_' or 'configurable_'

reportId.title: Reportid
reportId.description: Reference ID of the insights generation report

success.title: Success
success.description: Signifies whether the notification is a successful one or not

maskedDematID.title: Maskeddematid
maskedDematID.description: Demat ID assigned or issued to investor

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of primary holder operating the account

dob.title: Dob
dob.description: Date of birth of primary account holder

mobile.title: Mobile
mobile.description: Primary mobile number of account holder

nominee.title: Nominee
nominee.description: This field will indicate whether a nominee is registered

dematId.title: Dematid
dematId.description: Demat ID assigned or issued to investor

landline.title: Landline
landline.description: Landline number of primary account holder

email.title: Email
email.description: Email ID of primary account holder

pan.title: Pan
pan.description: PAN number of primary account holder

kycCompliance.title: Kyccompliance
kycCompliance.description: KYC status whether its completed or pending

amc.title: Amc
amc.description: Name of asset management company associated with investment

registrar.title: Registrar
registrar.description: Trust or institution registering and maintaining the detailed records

schemeCode.title: Schemecode
schemeCode.description: Code of scheme chosen by person for the investment

ucc.title: Ucc
ucc.description: Unique Client Code generated by Stock Exchanges

folioNo.title: Foliono
folioNo.description: Unique folio number associated with investment

closingUnits.title: Closingunits
closingUnits.description: Units allotted in folio till date

lienUnits.title: Lienunits
lienUnits.description: The number of units which have been marked as Lien

nav.title: Nav
nav.description: NAV is current market rate of security held as on date

navDate.title: Navdate
navDate.description: Last Available NAV date for the scheme of investment

lockinUnits.title: Lockinunits
lockinUnits.description: Units which are locked and not available for sale

costValue.title: Costvalue
costValue.description: Principal or Actual amount of investment

currentValue.title: Currentvalue
currentValue.description: Current value of investment as on date

txnId.title: Txnid
txnId.description: Transaction ID recorded or captured for investment made

amc.title: Amc
amc.description: Asset Management company which is operating the fund

startDate.title: Startdate
startDate.description: The date from which the Financial Information was requested

endDate.title: Enddate
endDate.description: The date till which the Financial Information was requested
